00035 class GaussianKernel
00036 {
00037  public:
00041   GaussianKernel() : bandwidth(1.0), gamma(-0.5)
00042   { }
00043 
00049   GaussianKernel(const double bandwidth) :
00050       bandwidth(bandwidth),
00051       gamma(-0.5 * pow(bandwidth, -2.0))
00052   { }
00053 
00065   template<typename VecType>
00066   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b) const
00067   {
00068     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00069     return exp(gamma * metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b));
00070   }
00071 
00079   double Evaluate(const double t) const
00080   {
00081     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00082     return exp(gamma * std::pow(t, 2.0));
00083   }
00084 
00091   double Normalizer(const size_t dimension)
00092   {
00093     return pow(sqrt(2.0 * M_PI) * bandwidth, (double) dimension);
00094   }
00095 
00103   template<typename VecType>
00104   double ConvolutionIntegral(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00105   {
00106     return Evaluate(sqrt(metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b) / 2.0)) /
00107       (Normalizer(a.n_rows) * pow(2.0, (double) a.n_rows / 2.0));
00108   }
00109 
00110 
00112   double Bandwidth() const { return bandwidth; }
00113 
00116   void Bandwidth(const double bandwidth)
00117   {
00118     this->bandwidth = bandwidth;
00119     this->gamma = -0.5 * pow(bandwidth, -2.0);
00120   }
00121 
00123   double Gamma() const { return gamma; }
00124 
00126   std::string ToString() const
00127   {
00128     std::ostringstream convert;
00129     convert << "GaussianKernel [" << this << "]" << std::endl;
00130     convert << "  Bandwidth: " << bandwidth << std::endl;
00131     return convert.str();
00132   }
